versionA.text:
A researcher is trying to estimate the average number of children born to couples who do not practice birth control. The mean for a random sample of 100 such couples is 5.2 with s = 2.1. 
 
 Find the 95% confidence interval for the mean (μ) of all couples not practicing birth control. You are responsible to enter the lower interval. (Your partner will be responsible for the higher interval)

versionB.text:
A researcher is trying to estimate the average number of children born to couples who do not practice birth control. The mean for a random sample of 100 such couples is 5.2 with s = 2.1. 
 
 Find the 95% confidence interval for the mean (μ) of all couples not practicing birth control. You are responsible to enter the higher interval. (Your partner will be responsible for the lower interval)
